DOC.brief_summary: Behavioral weight loss program successfully reduce body weight , program available limited number overweight obese individual . This project evaluate unique weight loss approach combine self-sustaining weight loss campaign ( outreach ) train behavioral weight loss strategy strategies increase accountability ( improve weight loss success ) . This innovative combination potential cost-effective model disseminate weight control intervention .
DOC.brief_title: State-wide Health Approach Increase Reach Effectiveness : Study 1
DOC.detailed_description: Participants randomly assign 1 3 treatment arm : Shape Up Rhode Island ( SURI ; community-based weight loss campaign ) , SURI plus Internet-based behavioral weight loss program ( SURI + IBWL ) , SURI + IBWL + optional group session ( SURI + IBWL + Group ) . Primary outcome weight loss 12-weeks .
DOC.criteria: 1. age 1870 year 2 . Body Mass Index > 25 kg/m2 3 . Both gender recruit ; estimate 70 % participant woman . 4 . All ethnic group recruit , goal recruit 33 % minority ( see specific recruitment plan ) 5 . No health problem make weight loss unsupervised exercise unsafe 6 . English speaking Exclusion criterion : 1. report heart condition , chest pain period activity rest , loss consciousness Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ; item 14 ) . Individuals endorse joint problem , prescription medication use medical condition could limit exercise require obtain write physician consent participate . 2. currently pregnant intend become pregnant next 12 month 3. plan move outside state within next 12 month 4. previously participate Shape Up Rhode Island 2008 pilot study
